description: Detect remote login by Administrator user (depending on internal pattern).
name: Admin User Remote Logon
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"4624" AND winlog.event_data.LogonType:"10" AND winlog.event_data.AuthenticationPackageName:"Negotiate" AND winlog.event_data.TargetUserName:Admin*)
author: juju4
